feed.subtitle: Hello and welcome to my blog! Here, I document my journey in Landscape Architecture, Graphic Design and IT projects. I am a creative individual who enjoys human-centered design, respecting the relationships between humans, nature, and spaces.

entry.title: Project1
entry.content:
This project aims to maintain the site's amenities and improve a temporary landscape area. The temporary landscape area will be carefully created as a clean and enjoyable space for public.

The primary considerations for selecting plants are "easy maintenance, fast growth, and good drainage."

The project involves landscape design, landscape specifications, and a year of maintenance to ensure the plants are well-established.
entry.summary: This project aims to maintain the site's amenities and improve a temporary landscape area. The temporary landscape area will be carefully created as a clean and enjoyable space for public. The primary considerations for selecting plants are "easy maintenance, fast growth, and good drainage." The project involves landscape design, landscape specifications, and a year of maintenance to ensure the plants are well-established.

entry.title: Project2
entry.content: This project involves close collaboration with the team to deliver the best outcome in landscape design. My design principle is to create an environment that is both beautiful and practical, while also enhancing privacy between neighbourhoods and offering an exceptional outdoor experience for residents.
entry.summary: This project involves close collaboration with the team to deliver the best outcome in landscape design. My design principle is to create an environment that is both beautiful and practical, while also enhancing privacy between neighbourhoods and offering an exceptional outdoor experience for residents.

entry.title: Project5
entry.content: Created a 3D model and site plan for the project based on the site survey and the client's requirements. These visuals provide a conceptual representation of the design and effectively communicate the proposed ideas.
entry.summary: Created a 3D model and site plan for the project based on the site survey and the client's requirements. These visuals provide a conceptual representation of the design and effectively communicate the proposed ideas.

entry.title: Project6
entry.content: This project involves collaboration with engineers. We work closely to bring ideas to life digitally and present them to the client. Our open communication forms the foundation of our collaboration, ensuring that the design aligns with the technical requirements and the site's conditions.
entry.summary: This project involves collaboration with engineers. We work closely to bring ideas to life digitally and present them to the client. Our open communication forms the foundation of our collaboration, ensuring that the design aligns with the technical requirements and the site's conditions.

entry.title: Project7
entry.content: Prepared detailed drawings of the residential project, which include the following elements: gate, retaining wall and fence.
entry.summary: Prepared detailed drawings of the residential project, which include the following elements: gate, retaining wall and fence.

entry.title: Project8
entry.content: Clevedon is a picturesque town located south of Auckland, offering a perfect destination for family holidays and quality time together. Situated close to Duer Regional Park and Reserve, Clevedon boasts stunning scenic views and natural beauty. This project is a continuation of my previous group work, focused on developing a tourism route that enhances the overall experience for visitors to Clevedon. My part of the project is located on a mountain route with a hiking track and aims to create a memorable and enjoyable journey.
entry.summary: Clevedon is a picturesque town located south of Auckland, offering a perfect destination for family holidays and quality time together. Situated close to Duer Regional Park and Reserve, Clevedon boasts stunning scenic views and natural beauty. This project is a continuation of my previous group work, focused on developing a tourism route that enhances the overall experience for visitors to Clevedon. My part of the project is located on a mountain route with a hiking track and aims to create a memorable and enjoyable journey.

entry.title: Project9
entry.content: Designing for the aging population requires incorporating inclusive design principles to ensure accessibility and enhance the overall experience. By considering factors such as hearing, vision, and physical movement, the goal is to create a space that promotes independence, accessibility, and a sense of belonging for all individuals, regardless of their abilities or age.
entry.summary: Designing for the aging population requires incorporating inclusive design principles to ensure accessibility and enhance the overall experience. By considering factors such as hearing, vision, and physical movement, the goal is to create a space that promotes independence, accessibility, and a sense of belonging for all individuals, regardless of their abilities or age.
